snippet: On Sunday at the French Open, Rafael Nadal will be seeking his record seventh singles title while Novak Djokovic will try to win his first at Roland Garros.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column notes that Rafael Nadal will be seeking his record seventh French Open singles title while his opponent Novak Djokovic will try to win his first at Roland Garros.
lead_paragraph: On Sunday at the French Open, Rafael Nadal will be seeking his record seventh singles title while Novak Djokovic will try to win his first at Roland Garros.

headline.seo: French Open — Nadal and Djokovic Chasing Alternate Histories
headline.main: Standing in Djokovic’s Way: An Immovable Object
headline.print_headline: Standing in Djokovic’s Way: An Immovable Object
